duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide superior customer service and assist customers with product selections
Prepare, package, and merchandise fresh product on a daily basis while maintaining food safety/sanitation standards
Use suggestive selling techniques to meet customer needs and build department sales
Clean and sanitize display cases, properly operate/maintain equipment, and comply with food safety and sanitation standards
Additional department-specific responsibilities such as preparing specialty drinks, floral arrangements, meat and seafood preparation, and stocking/rotating products
